title: Sidewall
description: Cocktail or bar paper. Next to a large-scale pilsner glass is a pink elephant holding a pilsner glass. Next to a large-scale champagne glass is a coiffed poodle holding a glass of champagne. Next to a large-scale martini glass is a rooster sipping a martini. A ribbon and a ribbon-like staff with musical notes runs haphazard throughout the piece. Printed on a purple ground.
name: Sidewall
